item.title: Story
item.description: .story-day { border: 1px solid silver; border-radius: 5px; box-shadow: 2px 2px rgb(80, 80, 80); margin: 30px 0; padding: 15px; } .story-date { font-size: 3.5rem; font-family: 'Poiret One', cursive; } .story-problem { margin: 15px; margin-top: 50px; } .story-problem-title { font-size: 1.7rem; font-weight: bold; letter-spacing: 5px; word-spacing: 10px; } .story-problem-statement { color: indianred; letter-spacing: 5px; word-spacing: 15px; } .story-time { margin-top: 50px; font-size: 3rem; } .

item.title: About
item.description: THE VIRUS .Lyli is a virus that corrupts files on a computer. It changes the first 150kb according to this site; and adds .lyli to the name of the files it corrupts. What comes after the last dot “.” in the name of the file, tells the computer what kind of file it is; and what softwares can open the file. Adding .lyli to the end of the file makes the file un-recognisable to the computer.
